It's a letter addressed to you. It reads:
\fiTo my ever kind and giving sister,
\fiIf you are reading this, I’ve already left
town. Since we will likely never see each
other again, here’s the truth. I was once

It’s a quiet village, and every day is like

business tycoon. I’ll be okay, and I know
